title: Home Minister Amit Shah Introduces Bills to Overhaul 'Colonial-Era' Criminal Laws: IPC, CrPC to be Repealed
comments:
Indian Penal Code (IPC), Code of Criminal Procedure (CrPC), and Indian Evidence Act set to be replaced. 3 new bills were introduced 

—> IPC to Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita.

—> CrPC to Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita.

—> Indian Evidence Act to Bharatiya Sakshya.
